Title: Directs the state board of elections to implement a ballot tracking system for use by absentee ballot voters to track the status of their ballots
Summary: Directs the state board of elections to implement a ballot tracking system for use by absentee ballot voters to track the status of their ballots; directs that funding be provided from the Help America Vote Act Implementation Account.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to directing the state board of elections to implement a ballot tracking system for use by absentee ballot voters to track the status of their ballots
